name: Guest Video Protection
author: ArtistScope

sections.description:
The Guest Video Protection plugin enables the embedding of copy protected media by using an iFrame. Pages displayed in that iFrame can contain images, text, PDF and video most securely protected from all exploits including save, copy, screenshot and screen recording… and they can be viewd on all computers and devices including mobile phones.

NOTE: This plugin displays your media from a third party service provided by Guest Video.

Guest Video provides a most unique “copy protected web hosting” service, unique in that it is the only web hosting service to provide real copy protection and it is the only hosting service that uses the ArtistScope Site Protection System (ASPS). ASPS copy protection is more secure than ever desired but requires a dedicated server or VPS to install at system level. This plugin solves that problem by utilising ASPS via an iFrame.

Licensing

  • This plugin is free to use. However it will require at least a Guest Video “DEMO” account to benefit from the special features.
  • For a DEMO account visit Guest Video for a 14-day free trial.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get started.

  1. Install WordPress Classic Editor plugin.
  2. Upload the “guest-video-protection” folder and its contents to “/wp-content/plugins/”.
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  4. Go to Guest Video to create a 14-day free trial.

Click to download the User-Guide in PDF format.

If you have problems getting started, email us from the Guest Video website for a faster response than the WP forum.
sections.changelog:
1.2.0

  • Checked for WP 6.6.

1.1.0

  • Fix to prevent previews in WP editors to avoid errors.

1.0.0

  • First release.

short_description: Secure copy protection for images, video and PDF. Prevent save, screenshots, screen capture and screen recording.
